text: Berlin (Germany), iOS Developer, Full Time. SoundCloud in Berlin are looking for experienced iOS developers to join our small team working on our huge mobile app. We're looking for people experienced with big applications, with an eye for UX and UI. Experience working with audio is a plus. We're scaling dramatically, so if you've seen that before we'd like to hear from you. http://soundcloud.com/jobs/2012-01-27-ios-developer-berlin-g...
